title: Funding opportunity: Collaborate with researchers in Luxembourg
description: UK Research and Innovation (UKRI) and FNR have signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) to welcome and support collaborative applications. UKRI will receive and assess joint applications from eligible UK and Luxembourg applicants on behalf of both organisations. This is not a separate research funding scheme. UKRI and FNR will co-fund applications to UKRI councilsâ€™ responsive mode funding opportunities, in some cases named standard research grant opportunities. This page will change to reflect the new UKRI Funding Service. See How applicants use the Funding Service.
